short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a dose of optimism daily! Every tab is a dose of positivity, optimism and motivation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this Chrome extension, we help you stay positive during the day. Every time you open a new tab, there will be a new positive quote with a beautiful background.

If you have ideas ore feedback, please let me know ❤️
